import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; const ApplyForm = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ first_name: "", last_name: "", }); let name, value; const handleInput = (e) => { console.log(e) name = e.target.name value = e.target.value setForm({ ...form, [name]: value }) } const postData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const { first_name, last_name } = form const res = await fetch("/ApplyForm", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ first_name, last_name }) }); const data = await res.json() if (data.status === 400 || !data) { window.alert("Invalid Registration") console.log("invalid registration") } else { window.alert("Registration successfull") console.log("successfull registration") } } return (

E-VISA APPLICATION









) } export default ApplyForm
